verses.text: How lovely \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w Your|strong="H5921"\w* dwelling place, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Hosts!

\w My|strong="H3068"\w* soul longs, \w even|strong="H3068"\w* faints, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* courts \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*; \w my|strong="H3068"\w* heart \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* flesh cry \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* living \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Even|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* sparrow \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w found|strong="H1571"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w home|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* swallow \w a|strong="H3068"\w* nest \w for|strong="H7442"\w* \w herself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w where|strong="H2691"\w* \w she|strong="H3820"\w* places \w her|strong="H1571"\w* young near \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* altars, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Hosts, \w my|strong="H3068"\w* King \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*.

How blessed \w are|strong="H3068"\w* those \w who|strong="H3068"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*! \w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* ever praising \w You|strong="H4672"\w*. Selah

Blessed \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w those|strong="H3427"\w* whose strength \w is|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w You|strong="H1004"\w*, whose hearts \w are|strong="H1004"\w* \w set|strong="H3427"\w* \w on|strong="H3427"\w* pilgrimage.

\w As|strong="H3824"\w* \w they|strong="H4546"\w* pass through \w the|strong="H5797"\w* Valley \w of|strong="H3824"\w* Baca,\f + \fr 84:6 \ft Or Valley of Poplars\f* \w they|strong="H4546"\w* make it \w a|strong="H3068"\w* place \w of|strong="H3824"\w* springs; even \w the|strong="H5797"\w* autumn rain covers it \w with|strong="H3824"\w* pools.\f + \fr 84:6 \ft Or with blessings\f*
\w They|strong="H1571"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w from|strong="H5674"\w* strength \w to|strong="H5674"\w* strength, until each appears \w before|strong="H5674"\w* God \w in|strong="H1571"\w* Zion.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H2428"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H2428"\w*, hear \w my|strong="H7200"\w* prayer; \w give|strong="H7200"\w* ear, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* God \w of|strong="H2428"\w* Jacob. Selah

Take notice \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* shield, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w look|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w favor|strong="H3068"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* face \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* anointed.

\w For|strong="H6440"\w* better \w is|strong="H6440"\w* \w one|strong="H7200"\w* day \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w Your|strong="H6440"\w* courts \w than|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand elsewhere. \w I|strong="H7200"\w* would rather \w be|strong="H6440"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* doorkeeper \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H7200"\w* God \w than|strong="H6440"\w* dwell \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tents \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* wicked.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* God \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* sun \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* shield; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* gives grace \w and|strong="H3117"\w* glory; \w He|strong="H3588"\w* withholds no \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w thing|strong="H2896"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w those|strong="H3588"\w* \w who|strong="H2896"\w* walk \w with|strong="H1004"\w* integrity.

\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Hosts, \w how|strong="H3588"\w* blessed \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H2896"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* trusts \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*!
